segments.text: I see a boy standing on a stool, trying to reach a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his sister is standing nearby, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are trying to get cookies without their mother knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the mother is busy drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she will notice the children's mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall off the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl is smiling, she seems excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are having fun, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they will get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
